user_profile: User 877 is an adult male with a penchant for exploring social places, particularly bars and restaurants. He enjoys an active lifestyle, visiting the gym regularly to stay fit. He often attends various events at music venues and stadiums, indicating a love for both live music and sports. User 877 values his social life, frequently connecting with friends and enjoying the ambiance of food and drink shops. With a college education, he is likely to engage in intellectual and social activities, showing openness to new experiences. Financially, he is situated in the middle socioeconomic level with patterns suggesting a balance between leisure and fitness activities. Expected future visits could include local stadiums for sports events (POI ID 2857), bars for social gatherings (POI ID 216), and clothing stores (POI ID 1203).
